revised_title: Fossil Reptilia Research: Klipfontein, Fraserburg Specimens
tldr: This article discusses the research on the structure, organization, and classification of fossil reptiles, specifically focusing on two small specimens found in Klipfontein, Fraserburg. The author examines the skeletal remains and compares them to known reptile types, noting similarities to Theriodonts and Dicynodonts. The findings suggest that these remains may belong to a distinct group separate from Cynodontia and Gomphodontia.
